name: MEC Chromatek Insulated Cycling Water Bottle 680ml
description: Don't ruin your ride with plastic-tasting water. The Chromatek Cycling Water Bottle features an incredibly thin (20 nanometers) silicone dioxide coating that resists taste, odour and stains so you get fresh water with every gulp. The insulated liner ensures your liquid stays the temperature you want it, no matter the conditions outside.Soft LDPE body is easy to squeeze and BPA-free.Chromatek insulated liner keeps liquids cold.Thin silicone coating prevents staining or tastes to keep your water pure and bottle clean.MoFlo cap high-flow cap delivers liquid when you need it.Fits most standard bottle cages.To clean: shake with soapy water. Do not scrub – this could damage the silicone layer.
